text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of the scrimmage against the<n>veteran trainer has
arrived.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I'm so glad you came today to<n>support me, Tamtam.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Ya don't gotta pat my head<n>every time ya see me!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But anyway, 'course I'd come. We<n>trained together this
whole time, so ya<n>better show me some results!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: You got it!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: How are you feeling, Trainer? Feeling<n>nervous?
choice_data_list: I should be the one asking you that question...
I should be the one asking you that question...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: You know best, but I can't help<n>worrying about you a little.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I feel great though, because I know<n>you're behind me all
the way.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Good morning, Rookie and Super<n>Creek. It looks like you've
done your<n>training accordingly.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Good morning. I look forward to<n>today's race.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
You're taking this quite casually. I<n>suppose this means
you're fully<n>ready to join my team.
choice_data_list: Super Creek isn't going to lose.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh my, when did you become so<n>bold? ♪

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I-I can see that you two are close, but<n>that relationship ends
today. I already<n>have Super Creek's new training<n>plan
ready.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With unwavering confidence, the<n>veteran trainer walks
away.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Now that we've finished saying hello,<n>why don't we go
ahead and get ready<n>ourselves?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Even though today's race isn't<n>official, I'll be sure to grab
our first<n>win. Think of it as a little present from<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yup! I'm gonna give it all I have! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, the race between Super<n>Creek and the veteran
trainer's racer<n>begins.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... As I expected, she'spretty fast.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
But I won't let my trainer and<n>Tamtam's efforts go to
waste!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek accelerates to a<n>breakneck pace despite it only
being<n>the first half of the race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This is just like at the tryouts, but<n>somehow she's running
even faster.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
She's not even at the halfway mark,<n>but she's already
breaking into a<n>sprint?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Nah, ya just don't get it. That's not a<n>sprint—it's her
runnin' style. She<n>always had the skills to make her<n>debut
whenever she wanted.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
The whole reason she hasn't<n>debuted yet is 'cause her
trainer was<n>lookin' out for her.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Bein' as she's not in great shape<n>right now.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text: You're saying this isn't her peakcondition?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Da heck, ya didn't know?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
She wasn't doin' well for a few days<n>since you became
her trainer... Well, I<n>s'pose you wouldn't know, since<n>
she's not the type to tell anyone. She<n>doesn't like worryin'
people.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This whole time, I thought it was my<n>inability as a rookie to
create a<n>suitable training plan. Little did I know<n>that she's
been struggling...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
...But ya did switch up her trainin',<n>yeah? It made her real
happy. Kept<n>tellin' me how you were growin' day<n>by day.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
In the end, any mistakes you made<n>with your plan don't
matter. What's<n>most important is that you care 'bout<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But I still can't escape the nagging<n>feeling that she's been
caring for me<n>far more than I've been able to care<n>for her!
choice_data_list:
I promise I'm gonna be the best and most
reliable trainer for you!

I promise I'm gonna be the best and most
reliable trainer for you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Gathering all of my feelings, I shout<n>across the field with all
my might at<n>Super Creek.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh my, Trainer! ♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna win so I can keep giving<n>you all the attention you
need!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
True to her word, Super Creek<n>finishes far ahead of her
opponent<n>and grabs the win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A little while later...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, I'm actually kind of nervous now<n>that my debut race is
approaching.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear, we can't have that now.<n>Everything is going to be
just fine,<n>Trainer. You're doing such a great<n>job.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Once I debut, I'm going to bring home<n>all the trophies for us.
I'll show<n>everyone what a wonderful trainer<n>you are.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I promise I'll take good care of you,<n>okay? ♪
